name: ScentSationals Full Size Wax Warmer, Inspiration

reviews.name: ScentSationals Full Size Wax Warmer, Inspiration
reviews.reviewText: bought one of these, then went back and bought 5 more, that way the whole house has them, some are the outlet$10 ones, which work just as well. Make sure you take them and put them in the freezer and the wax will pop right out, I spent a few times messing with the wax because i never read the directions. All these diferent warmers are GREAT! They also work as a night light. I have gone crazy buying up all different sents to see what we like best. So far cant find the lilac which i heard smell exactly like the flower, our local stores never have it. Butterscotch, Cafe a laite(smells like chocolate coffee), CUPCAKE(my husband loves)are just some that we like so far.
reviews.title: Buy any one of these, they are all great!!

reviews.name: ScentSationals Full Size Wax Warmer, Inspiration
reviews.reviewText: I love this product and it looks so good in my living room
reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!!!!!!

reviews.name: ScentSationals Full Size Wax Warmer, Inspiration
reviews.reviewText: I love it. Very easy set up and clean up! My scents are burning now and my home smells great. I am thinking of adding maybe 3 more of these to my home to have each room filled generously with the aroma. It's cute and it is perfect for my brown and tan d√©cor. It's safer since the heat is produced thru a light bulb. Its like a mini night light as well. Very satisfied customer!
reviews.title: Great wax warmer for first time buyer!

reviews.name: ScentSationals Full Size Wax Warmer, Inspiration
reviews.title: Wax warmer

reviews.name: ScentSationals Full Size Wax Warmer, Inspiration
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased. Looks exactly as picture and works well. I'm glad I purchased it.
reviews.title: Great warmer
